Arguments.Name: in_OrchestratorQueueName
Arguments.Tooltip: Allows the Orchestrator queue name to be passed as an argument, instead of only being defined in the configuration file.

Arguments.Name: in_SEEmailAlerts
Arguments.Tooltip: Allows the System Exception emails  to be passed as an argument, instead of only being defined in the configuration file.

Arguments.Name: in_StatusreportEmail
Arguments.Tooltip: Allows the Status repor emails to be passed as an argument, instead of only being defined in the configuration file.

Arguments.Name: in_SAPSystem
Arguments.Tooltip: Please create all process specific Assets as In Arguments

Arguments.Name: in_Record_Video
Arguments.Tooltip: The input argument needs to be set to string, becuase the default declaration of Boolean is set to False . The value should be either TRUE or  FALSE

Arguments.Name: in_TestingDebug
Arguments.Tooltip: Argument defined to control the config values that needs to be used, Testing and Production values

Arguments.Name: in_OrchestratorQueueFolder
Arguments.Tooltip: Allow Folder Name to be passed as argument instead of providing in config file
